title: Ukraine: Drug dealer whipped with cable ties and 'beaten to death' - Reddit
body: 34M subscribers in the worldnews community. A place for major news from around the world, excluding US-internal news.
readable_content:
- miraoister (2015-02-17): Ukraine: Drug dealer whipped with cable ties and 'beaten to death'
In Donetsk yet. Thanks for the attempted "liberation" of the region Russia. Looks like those in the region are real liberators.
